                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6229866153&amp;cid=4482810007968147&amp;nick=只做个陌生人嫂&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2656274875&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                                                                                                                        【国航通报<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BB%8E%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9D%A5%E4%BA%AC%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E5%A5%B3%E5%AD%90%E5%AF%B9%E4%B9%98%E5%8A%A1%E5%91%98%E6%92%92%E8%B0%8E%23&amp;from=default">#从美国来京确诊女子对乘务员撒谎#</a>】今天，北京市新冠肺炎疫情防控工作发布会上，国航介绍美国输入病例黎某一家三口3月12日乘坐国航CA988次航班情况：航班起飞一小时后，旅客黎某找到乘务员，自述感到憋气、乏力、脸部微麻，称无同行者，登机前未用药，但一周前有短暂发烧史。航班落地前两小 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyK6r2z0h" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482803750611213:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482803750611213&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490441&amp;ssig=zJ82Lba087" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482797206553568" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyJVSruSI?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 17:46" date="1584265603000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482797206553568:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 17:46</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%AE%9A%E7%82%B9%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E6%9C%88%E5%BA%95%E5%89%8D%E5%B0%86%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E5%AE%8C%E6%88%90%E4%BF%AE%E5%A4%8D%23&amp;from=default">#武汉定点医院月底前将全部完成修复#</a>】武汉市政府副秘书长李涛：分批开展定点医院修复，分期分批把全市46家新冠肺炎收治定点医院的病人，向医疗资源丰富的10家定点医院集中。腾退出来的医院，做好消杀、医疗设备转换、空间改造、合理配置医护人员，尽快修复原有医疗体系，恢复正常医疗秩序。10日，已 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJVSruSI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482797206553568:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482797206553568&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%9D%9E%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%B0%B1%E5%8C%BB%E5%AE%89%E6%8E%92%23&amp;from=default">#武汉非新冠肺炎患者就医安排#</a>】①疫苗接种分批分类逐步开放：从3月14日起，恢复部分接种门诊服务，主要包括儿童预防、狂犬疫苗、产科、成人预防接种等；②划区划片、分类协同、定点收治，优先保障危急重症、孕产妇、儿童、肿瘤患者等特殊人群的就医需求；③鼓励网络问诊、实名制网上预约挂号、分时 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJHxmWfs" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482788315467126:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482788315467126&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【不能掉以轻心！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%8D%AB%E5%81%A5%E5%A7%94%E6%8F%90%E9%86%92%E7%A4%BE%E5%8C%BA%E4%BC%A0%E6%9F%93%E9%A3%8E%E9%99%A9%23&amp;from=default">#武汉卫健委提醒社区传染风险#</a>】武汉卫健委副主任郑云：武汉市现在防疫形势依然严峻。3月13日、14日，武汉均有1例确诊病例来自于门诊，患者本人和家属在居家期间，有外出和在小区内活动的轨迹，不排除有社区感染的可能。当前还是有一定的社区传染的风险，请大家保持高度警惕。&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJzz1wng" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482783370362778:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482783370362778&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482774943882118" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyJlYghUO?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 16:18" date="1584260295000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482774943882118:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 16:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%98%8E%E8%B5%B7%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BF%9B%E4%BA%AC%E4%BA%BA%E5%91%98%E5%9D%87%E8%BD%AC%E9%80%81%E9%9B%86%E4%B8%AD%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%82%B9%23&amp;from=default">#明起所有境外进京人员均转送集中隔离点#</a> 隔离14天】北京市人民政府副秘书长陈蓓：①即日起，首都机场全部国际及港澳台地区进港航班均停靠首都机场T3-D处置专区，全部人员严格落实健康申报卡填报。②从3月16日0时起，所有境外进京人员，均应转送至集中隔离点进行14天的隔离观察，集中观察点将配置专 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJlYghUO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482774943882118:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482774943882118&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2656274875/IyJlYghUO&amp;mid=4482774943882118&amp;name=央视新闻&amp;uid=2656274875&amp;domain=cctvxinwen" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>3284</em></span></span></span></a>
                            <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                        </li>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490441&amp;ssig=zJ82Lba087" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482772477167582" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyJhZu4Ca?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 16:08" date="1584259707000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482772477167582:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 16:08</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E4%B8%80%E5%B8%82%E9%95%BF%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#意大利一市长感染新冠肺炎去世#</a>】据意大利媒体报道，当地时间13日，意大利北部切内市市长乔治·瓦洛蒂因感染新冠病毒去世，享年70岁。乔治·瓦洛蒂也成为意大利首位感染新冠肺炎病毒死亡的地方长官。（总台记者李耀洋） ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4482771286085180" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyJg4px24?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 16:03" date="1584259423000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482771286085180:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 16:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/IqWDq" rel="nofollow">微博原生直播</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E5%B7%A5%E4%BD%9C%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#北京疫情防控工作发布会#</a>】今天，北京市召开疫情防控新闻发布会。北京市海关、市城管执法局、市疾控中心、北京地坛医院、中国国际航空公司有关单位将发布信息，并答记者问。关注！（总台央视记者罗子瑛） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482771286085180:1034-video:1034%3A4482786308849667:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482771286085180:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zoyHvW" alt="http://t.cn/A6zoyHvW" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E5%9B%9E%E5%BA%94%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E8%B4%B9%E7%94%A8%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%23&amp;from=default">#上海回应境外输入病例医疗费用问题#</a>】今天，上海市卫健委新闻发言人郑锦介绍，境外回国人员新冠肺炎输入病例医疗费用支付问题：境外回国人员输入病例中①参加基本医疗保险的人员，在基本医保、大病保险、医疗救助等按规定支付医疗费用后，个人负担部分财政给予补助；②未参加基本医疗保险的，医疗费 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJas45NU" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482767800975626:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482767800975626&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E6%B6%88%E5%8D%8F%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E6%B6%88%E8%B4%B9%E8%80%85%E7%BB%B4%E6%9D%83%E7%83%AD%E7%82%B9%23&amp;from=default">#中消协发布疫情期间消费者维权热点#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%9C%9F%E9%97%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%B1%BB%E6%8A%95%E8%AF%89%E5%8D%A0%E6%AF%94%E6%9C%80%E9%AB%98%23&amp;from=default">#疫情期间口罩类投诉占比最高#</a>】中国消费者协会通报：今年1月20日至2月29日，全国消协组织共受理涉疫情消费者投诉180972件。其中：涉及口罩类投诉79368件，占比43.86%；蔬菜粮油类占比8.31%；餐饮服务类占比7.64%；网络购物类占比5.60%；出行服务类占比5.01%。中 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyJ5NBEkB" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482764918973173:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482764918973173&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                <a href="javascript:void(0)" class="S_txt1" action-type="fl_like" action-data="object_id=4482765136898127&amp;object_type=comment&amp;o_uid=6015696469&amp;commentmid=4482764918973173" title="赞"><span node-type="like_status" class=""><em class="W_ficon ficon_praised S_txt2">ñ</em><em>21</em></span></a>                    </span></li>
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-15 15:39</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 二级评论 -->

            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>
            </div>
        </div>
                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
</div>                                        <!-- 一级评论 -->

            </div>
            <!-- 列表-内容 -->
        </div>
        <!-- 评论-列表 -->
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>【直播！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%BD%E5%8A%A1%E9%99%A2%E8%81%94%E9%98%B2%E8%81%94%E6%8E%A7%E6%9C%BA%E5%88%B6%E4%B8%BE%E8%A1%8C%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83%E4%BC%9A%23&amp;from=default">#国务院联防联控机制举行新闻发布会#</a>】今天，国务院联防联控机制举行新闻发布会，介绍发挥再贷款再贴现政策作用支持疫情防控和复工复产工作情况，人民银行、银保监会、农发行、农行有关负责人回答媒体提问。关注！（总台央视记者李雯婷） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482755524229323:1034-video:1034%3A4482768378200071:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482755524229323:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zSDxF9" alt="http://t.cn/A6zSDxF9" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a> . ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4482750713177596" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyIITdkDy?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 14:41" date="1584254518000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482750713177596:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 14:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://weibo.com/" rel="nofollow">正能量 · 视频社区</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E4%B8%BA%E6%94%B6%E6%B2%BB%E7%97%85%E4%BA%BA%E4%B8%89%E5%A4%A9%E4%B8%89%E5%A4%9C%E6%B2%A1%E7%9D%A1%E8%A7%89%23&amp;from=default">#医生为收治病人三天三夜没睡觉#</a>】3月，收治重症患者的医院里仍上演着与病毒的“拉锯战”。重症医护人员们回忆，疫情初期，转运患者的车辆不断涌向医院，三四百个病人同时入院，为尽快安顿好他们，有的医生三天三夜没睡觉，最后几乎站不稳，心中却只想着“病人不能等”……看 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyIITdkDy" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482750713177596:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482750713177596&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IyIw5dyKp&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">

        <div class="WB_detail">

                                    <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                                </li>
                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <!-- 赞 -->
                                <li><span class="line S_line1">

                            </ul>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-16 03:46</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%81%94%E5%90%88%E5%9B%BD%E7%A7%98%E4%B9%A6%E9%95%BF%E5%91%BC%E5%90%81%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E5%90%91%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E5%AE%A3%E6%88%98%23&amp;from=default">#联合国秘书长呼吁全球共同向新冠宣战#</a>】当地时间13日，联合国秘书长古特雷斯发表讲话，呼吁全球各国团结一致，向新冠病毒宣战。古特雷斯说，世界正面临着前所未有的公共卫生危机，我们应相信科学、采信事实，采取前所未有的个人、国家和国际行动。“我们共同应对，一定会共克时艰！”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyIkkygMV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482735488167689:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482735488167689&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2656274875&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4482735488167689"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>2389</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

        </div>
    </div>

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4482732052952952&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4482732052952952&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>

                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490451&amp;ssig=9ywaQMq9qZ" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482732052952952" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyIeNcocg?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 13:27" date="1584250069000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482732052952952:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 13:27</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【北京<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%A6%96%E9%83%BD%E6%9C%BA%E5%9C%BA%E5%85%A5%E5%A2%83%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E6%94%BF%E7%AD%96%23&amp;from=default">#首都机场入境最新政策#</a>：所有国际航班均停靠处置专区】即日起，首都机场全部国际及地区进港航班，均停靠首都机场处置专区。旅客经由海关进行测温等检疫排查，边检办理入境手续，非中转旅客在专属休息区等候摆渡车前往新国展旅客接驳区；中转旅客在办理完中转手续后，再前往专属休息区候机。<br>转 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyIeNcocg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482732052952952:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482732052952952&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=3248036930&amp;screen_name=zu海洋" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2020-3-15 13:29</div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482724599652821" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyI2LEv8F?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 12:58" date="1584248292000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482724599652821:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 12:58</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%AC%E5%AE%89%E9%83%A8%E8%BF%BD%E6%8E%88%E8%89%BE%E5%86%AC%E4%BA%8C%E7%BA%A7%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84%E6%A8%A1%E8%8C%83%E7%A7%B0%E5%8F%B7%23&amp;from=default">#公安部追授艾冬二级英雄模范称号#</a>】近日，公安部追授北京市公安局法制总队信访支队三级高级警长艾冬全国公安系统二级英雄模范称号。在疫情防控工作中，艾冬勇挑重担、忘我工作，高效开展对群众反映的涉疫情诉求线索核查、处置工作，不幸于2月15日突发脑出血，经抢救无效于2月22日牺牲，年仅45岁。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyI2LEv8F" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482724599652821:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482724599652821&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482722569521687" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyHZuDX1B?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 12:50" date="1584247808000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482722569521687:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 12:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%8F%8C%E6%B8%85%E9%9B%B6%23&amp;from=default">#重庆确诊疑似病例双清零#</a>】记者从重庆市卫健委了解到，今天，重庆市公共卫生医疗救治中心最后1例确诊病例出院。至此，重庆市全市实现在院确诊病例、疑似病例全部清零。截至目前，重庆累计报告确诊病例576例，治愈出院570例，死亡6例。（总台央视记者唐巍 李洪淼） ​​​​                                            </div>

        <div class="layer_menu_list" style="display: none; position: absolute; z-index: 999;" node-type="fl_menu_right">

                                                                                <li><a action-type="thrid_rend_iframe" href="javascript:void(0)" suda-data="" action-data="width=660&amp;height=556&amp;mid=4482717863360812&amp;src=%2F%2Fpromote.vip.weibo.com%2Fpromoteadvance%3Fdai_tou%3Dpc_profile_01%26touid%3D2656274875%26mid%3D4482717863360812&amp;title=推广" title="帮上头条">帮上头条</a></li>
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490451&amp;ssig=9ywaQMq9qZ" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482717863360812" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyHRUe6iE?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 12:31" date="1584246686000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482717863360812:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 12:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E4%B8%BA%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E4%BB%8B%E7%BB%8D%E8%AF%8A%E7%96%97%E6%96%B9%E6%A1%88%23&amp;from=default">#中国医疗队为意大利介绍诊疗方案#</a>】意大利国家传染病研究所附属医院，收治了超100名新冠肺炎患者。昨天，中国医疗专家队前往该院交流，详细介绍中国最新版诊疗方案。医疗队还探望了两名中国籍新冠肺炎康复患者，目前他们核酸检测已呈阴性。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%80%BB%E5%8F%B0%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E9%9A%8F%E9%98%9F%E6%8E%A2%E8%AE%BF%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#总台记者随队探访意大利医院#</a>，看独家视频↓（总台记者邓 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyHRUe6iE" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482717863360812:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482717863360812&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E4%B8%80%E5%91%A8%E7%98%A612%E6%96%A4%23&amp;from=default">#医生隔离一周瘦12斤#</a>：同事都在忙，自己也想做点什么】1月21日，同济医院医生周宁病倒了。症状疑似新冠肺炎，他立刻进行自我隔离。隔离期间，周宁对疫情形势忧心不已，一周瘦了12斤。他用文章记录下隔离的点滴，“我想告诉大家，要有信心！”隔离期一过，周宁就主动请缨来到一线，与病毒战斗。看 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyHJ98KyV" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482712432085613:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482712432085613&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

               <div class="btn W_fr"><a class="W_btn_a W_btn_a_disable" action-type="post" diss-data="module=scommlist&amp;group_source=&amp;tranandcomm=1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="return false" node-type="btnText">评论</a></div>

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

                                <a name="4482708086310316" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyHC8qtBi?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 11:52" date="1584244355000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482708086310316:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 11:52</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/4iDt6Q" rel="nofollow">微博云剪</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E5%B0%8F%E5%93%A5%E5%90%90%E6%A7%BD%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E9%98%B2%E7%96%AB%E5%95%A5%E4%B9%9F%E6%B2%A1%E5%81%9A%23&amp;from=default">#美国小哥吐槽美国防疫啥也没做#</a>：中国给了我们时间，可我们搞砸了】美国小哥马思瑞，2月初从中国返美。当时华盛顿机场并未采取防疫措施，马思瑞自行隔离了14天。现在，当地超市爆满，货架大都被抢空。他吐槽：“中国给我们1个月时间准备，可我们搞砸了，什么都没做。现在才意识到严重性！”&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyHC8qtBi" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482708086310316:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482708086310316&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【医疗队随队心理专家：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%BF%83%E7%90%86%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98%E5%A4%8D%E6%9D%82%E7%A8%8B%E5%BA%A6%E8%B6%85%E4%B9%8E%E6%83%B3%E8%B1%A1%23&amp;from=default">#重症患者心理问题复杂程度超乎想象#</a>】重症患者会出现各种心理问题。有些人焦虑、恐惧，想不通“为什么就自己中招”；有些人应激反应严重，不让人碰他；还有人因家人也在隔离甚至去世，陷入悲伤。救命，也要救心。如何为患者提供有效的心理支撑？看<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E6%92%AD%E5%87%BA%E9%87%8D%E7%97%87%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%91%E6%B2%BB%E7%BA%AA%E5%AE%9E%23&amp;from=default">#央视播出重症病例救治纪实#</a>↓ ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyHrl7FOz" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482701391829035:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482701391829035&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                    </ul>
                </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9A%94%E7%A6%BB%E7%97%85%E5%8C%BA%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%E6%9B%BE%E7%84%A6%E8%99%91%E5%88%B0%E5%81%9A%E5%99%A9%E6%A2%A6%23&amp;from=default">#隔离病区医生曾焦虑到做噩梦#</a>：人人都怕，进了病房见到病人就不怕了】陈澍是上海复旦大学附属华山医院支援武汉的医生。刚到一线时，“打仗”般的气氛让医护们焦虑，陈澍甚至会梦到同事没穿防护就进病房，半夜惊醒。但当他们看到活生生的需要救助的病人，恐惧消失了。奋战持续一个多月，大家越干越拼 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyH6mpXox" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482688386186517:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482688386186517&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E9%BB%84%E9%99%82%E5%8C%BA%E6%AE%A1%E8%91%AC%E7%AE%A1%E7%90%86%E6%89%80%E6%89%80%E9%95%BF%E8%A2%AB%E5%85%8D%E8%81%8C%23&amp;from=default">#武汉黄陂区殡葬管理所所长被免职#</a>】湖北省武汉市黄陂区新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部发布通报：昨晚8时50分，黄陂区委、区纪委发现江岸区海赋社区微信群反映“社区用殡仪馆车辆运送团购物资”。经查，当日下午，黄陂区乡镇殡葬车辆社会承包人吕某违规用所承包经营的殡葬用车给家住江岸区海赋江城小区的亲 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyGSudSNd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482679783308891:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482679783308891&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->

                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%A9%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A8162%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#韩国累计确诊8162例新冠肺炎#</a>】据韩国卫生部门消息，截至当地时间15日0时，过去24小时韩国共报告确诊新增新型冠状病毒感染者76例。韩国目前累计确诊8162例，死亡75例，治愈并解除隔离834例。这是韩国自2月22日以来，首次日新增确诊人数降至两位数。（总台记者唐鑫） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%85%A8%E9%83%A8%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%23&amp;from=default">#江苏所有病例全部治愈#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/9f/2018new_jiayou_org.png" title="[加油]" alt="[加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】今天，据江苏省卫健委，江苏省目前最后一位新冠肺炎在院确诊病例治愈出院。至此，江苏省累计631例病例已经全部治愈出院！无一例死亡病例！最后一位出院的患者是一名73岁的患者。3月14日0-24时，江苏省无新增确诊病例。（总台央视记者吴睿） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%B1%E5%90%8C%E6%88%98%E7%96%AB%23&amp;from=default">#共同战疫#</a>【独家！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%AE%E8%A7%86%E8%AE%B0%E8%80%85%E7%9B%B4%E5%87%BB%E7%BE%8E%E5%9B%BD%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#央视记者直击美国最新疫情#</a>】当地时间14日晚，美国白宫医生发布声明表示<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%89%B9%E6%9C%97%E6%99%AE%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E7%BB%93%E6%9E%9C%E9%98%B4%E6%80%A7%23&amp;from=default">#特朗普检测结果阴性#</a>；副总统彭斯的抗疫团队公布了最新防疫措施。美国各级政府是否真的开始重视新冠肺炎疫情？各州的状态又有哪些新变化？央视记者梳理解读↓看直播！（央视记者刘旭） <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4482664898205765:1034-video:1034%3A4482712711659536:page_100206_home:2656274875:4482664898205765:2656274875" title="央视新闻的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6zaKQ06" alt="http://t.cn/A6zaKQ06" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>央视新闻的微博视频</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyGutyqH3" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482664898205765:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482664898205765&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            <li>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IyGucFwsN&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490458&amp;ssig=JXRanj3zd0" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482664729896241" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyGucFwsN?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 09:00" date="1584234018000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482664729896241:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 09:00</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E5%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9E%8B%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#北京新增5例境外输入型病例#</a>：西班牙3例、意大利1例、泰国1例】3月14日0时至24时，北京市无新增报告新冠肺炎本地确诊病例。新增报告疑似病例1例。新增报告境外输入新冠肺炎确诊病例5例，其中西班牙3例、意大利1例、泰国1例。疑似病例8例，其中西班牙3例，美国、挪威、日本、意大利、英国各1例。密切 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyGucFwsN" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482664729896241:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482664729896241&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%8A%97%E7%96%AB%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E7%BA%BF%23&amp;from=default">#全球抗疫第一线#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E7%90%83%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E8%B6%8515%E4%B8%87%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全球新冠肺炎确诊病例累计超15万例#</a>】据美国约翰·霍布金斯大学发布的实时数据，截至美国东部时间14日20时15分，全球新冠病毒确诊病例为156102例，其中，美国确诊2726例，死亡54例。（央视记者王逢治） ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD4%E5%A4%A9%E4%B8%AA%E4%BD%8D%E6%95%B0%23&amp;from=default">#湖北新增病例连续4天个位数#</a> ​​​​ 转起继续加油！】3月11日0—24时，湖北新增确诊病例8例（武汉8例）；3月12日0—24时，湖北新增确诊病例5例（武汉5例）；3月13日0—24时，湖北新增确诊病例4例（武汉4例）；3月14日0—24时，湖北新增确诊病例4例。别松劲儿，继续加油！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%99%A4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%A4%96%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD10%E5%A4%A90%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%23&amp;from=default">#湖北除武汉外连续10天0新增#</a> 转起加油！】据湖北卫健委通报，3月14日0—24时，全省新增新冠肺炎确诊病例4例，其中：武汉市4例，其他16个市州均为0例。无境外输入性病例。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6zaxgtA" alt="http://t.cn/A6zaxgtA" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数等于1，只显示图片-->
                
				 		    <!--picture_count == 1-->
    <ul class="WB_media_a  WB_media_a_m1 clearfix" action-data="isPrivate=0&amp;relation=0&amp;clear_picSrc=%2F%2Fwx1.sinaimg.cn%2Fmw690%2F9e5389bbly1gcud91ub0mj20u01hcb29.jpg">

    <div class="screen_box"><a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="fl_menu"><i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down S_ficon">c</i></a>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482652642440700" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyGaIaeW8?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 08:12" date="1584231136000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482652642440700:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 08:12</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%235%E5%9C%B0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B16%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#5地新增境外输入病例16例#</a>】据国家卫健委通报，3月14日0—24时，新增报告境外输入确诊病例16例（北京5例，浙江4例，上海3例，甘肃3例，广东1例）。截至3月14日24时，累计报告境外输入确诊病例111例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=IyG9HaHSd&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>
                                                                                                            </span>
                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="央视新闻"><img usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.0.1080.1080.1024/002TLsr9ly8gk0aztvfa4j60u00u0gng02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609490458&amp;ssig=JXRanj3zd0" width="50" height="50" alt="央视新闻" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/cctvxinwen?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2656274875&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">央视新闻</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4482652012551933" target="_blank" href="/2656274875/IyG9HaHSd?from=page_1002062656274875_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-03-15 08:09" date="1584230986000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4482652012551933:fromprofile"> 2020-3-15 08:09</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2331%E7%9C%81%E5%8C%BA%E5%B8%82%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B20%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#31省区市新增确诊病例20例#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E4%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%23&amp;from=default">#武汉新增4例新冠肺炎#</a>】 3月14日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例20例，新增死亡病例10例（湖北10例），新增疑似病例39例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;当日新增治愈出院病例1370例，解除医学观察的密切接触者1409人，重症病例减少384例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;截至3月14日24 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyG9HaHSd" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482652012551933:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482652012551933&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="央视新闻">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E1%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%83%E5%A4%96%E8%BE%93%E5%85%A5%E5%9E%8B%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增1例境外输入型病例#</a>】3月14日12—24时，上海市排除新型冠状病毒肺炎疑似病例14例；新增1例确诊病例，为通过联防联控机制发现的境外输入型病例。该确诊病例为中国浙江籍，在意大利生活，3月11日自意大利米兰出发，经德国法兰克福转机，于3月12日抵达上海浦东国际机场，入关后即被集中隔离观 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2656274875/IyG3qieDI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4482648124346182:2656274875" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4482648124346182&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                          【不能掉以轻心！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" 隔离14天】北京市人民政府副秘书长陈蓓：①即日起，首都机场全部国际及港澳台地区进港航班均停靠首都机场T3-D处置专区，全部人员严格落实健康申报卡填报。②从3月16日0时起，所有境外进京人员，均应转送至集中隔离点进行14天的隔离观察，集中观察点将配置专 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2656274875\/IyJlYghUO\"                                                                                                              【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%84%8F%E5%A4%A7%E5%88%A9%E4%B8%80%E5%B8%82%E9%95%BF%E6%84%9F%E6%9F%93%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23&from=default\">#意大利一市长感染新冠肺炎去世#<\/a>】据意大利媒体报道，当地时间13日，意大利北部切内市市长乔治·瓦洛蒂因感染新冠病毒去世，享年70岁。乔治·瓦洛蒂也成为意大利首位感染新冠肺炎病毒死亡的地方长官。（总台记者李耀洋）                                 <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_next" action-type="next" title="下一首"></a>
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_loop" node-type="play_type" action-type="play_type" title="列表循环"></a>
                            </div>
                            <div class="vol_ctrl">
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_vol" title="音量" action-type="toggle_mute" node-type="toggle_mute"></a>

                                    <div class="cur_vol cur_volmute" style="width: 90%;" node-type="volume_range">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
        <div class="lyric_wrap" node-type="lrc" style="display:none">
    <div class="lyric_bg">
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_close" title="关闭" action-type="toggle_lrc"></a>
